title: Cornell Rocketry Team
subtitle: Software Lead
description: On the Cornell Rocketry Team, I lead a team of 7 software engineers to develop software for a high powered rocket. We work in low-level C and C++ and compete against over 160 other universites on a team of 45 students across 5 majors.

title: Cornell Hillel
subtitle: President
description: As president of Cornell Hillel, I serve on the Cornell Hillel board of trustees and Student Executive Board. On the student executive board, we organize large scale event

title: Samsung Electronics America
subtitle: Software Engineering Intern
description: At Samsung, I worked on the New Concept Divison's Client Engineering team. I developed software for 2022 model year Samsung Smart TVs with C# and React.js. I worked on the front end related to Game Hub feature on 2022 model Smart TVs.

title: MyHomeworkSpace
description: An online planner that lets you easily stay on top of your homework and tests. It synchronizes with the cloud, so you can access it anywhere you have an Internet connection.

title: Donorfide
description: A donation management software designed to be lightweight and powerful for small foundations.

title: Pulse Wearables
description: A wearable patch designed for people with heart conditions to help them monitor their physical activity.

title: Charlie Chatbot (MSKCC)
awards: Memorial Sloan Kettering DHI Summer Innovation Fellowship
description: A chatbot to improve communication between departments at Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center.

title: Honor With Code
awards: Memorial Sloan Kettering DHI Summer Innovation Fellowship
description: A program to donate Code School scholarships to injured veterans to help provide career training.

title: MyTiger

collaborators.name: Dalton School Student Government Technology Committee

description: A chatbot availible through text and Google Assistant to answer questions about your school day.
